subject: Re: Co-op forms
preview: Great, thanks so much. I will now send onto to Michelle for her check and hopefully we should be good to fly.  Nikki Ozeken  Customer Marketing and VAS Manager  Sonova Australia Pty Ltd 12 Inglewood P

full_threads.body:
Great, thanks so much. I will now send onto to Michelle for her check and hopefully we should be good to fly.

Nikki Ozeken

Customer Marketing and VAS Manager

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest

NSW 2153 Australia
Phone: +61 2 8858 1841
Mobile: +61 427 017 997
E-Mail: nikki.ozeken@sonova.com

Internet: http://www.phonak.com.au/

Hi Nikki, 

Thanks for picking those up, confirming the changes have been made.

Thanks Heath,

Almost there.

Please change 'Pick' to 'Tick' in the following three questions.

Please also add an open text box for the 'Other - please specify' option.

For the second question, change the 'Others' checkbox to 'Other - please specify' and add the open text box here too.



Nikki Ozeken

Customer Marketing and VAS Manager

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest

NSW 2153 Australia
Phone: +61 2 8858 1841
Mobile: +61 427 017 997
E-Mail: nikki.ozeken@sonova.com

Internet: http://www.phonak.com.au/

Hi Nikki, 

Sure, totally fine, confirming we have made those updates for you. 

The PDF attachments are now setup too!

You're a legend.

Sorry to be a huge pain but I have some more edits:

Marketing request form

Please make the 'Full name' a required field.

Please delete these two questions and the checkbox answers.



After the 'how many years have been operating' question, please order the questions as per below:



For this 'Other' check box, please add a free text box, so answers can be added.



Then the other questions can continue as is, however please update this question 'What co-op marketing support are you looking for this campaign?'

to

'What co-op marketing activity are you seeking support for?'

Agreement form changes

Please make the same fields as required as the request form.

Thanks Heath.

Nikki Ozeken

Customer Marketing and VAS Manager

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest

NSW 2153 Australia
Phone: +61 2 8858 1841
Mobile: +61 427 017 997
E-Mail: nikki.ozeken@sonova.com

Internet: http://www.phonak.com.au/

Hi Nikki, 

Confirming we have removed the very obvious save and send and just replaced it with an 'asterisk' symbol. I think this should do the trick. 

The email notifications are currently being setup to attach a PDF to the notification email that you receive. If Michelle needs to get this underway, she can still use the form, and we will manually get you the PDF afterwards. Either way, it will be ready mid-afternoon.
@glen my thought on this is just to add the "Save" button on the first and second page of the form. For the sake of aesthetics and logic since on the 2nd page, the form has the submit button already.

Hi Heath,

My apologies, I just saw the purpose of the save and send link which I had asked to remove in an email last night lol!

My thoughts are that the 'save and send' link might be confusing for the customer. Is there another way we can approach this?

I think we should remove it from the first page as it's unlikely we would need to save and send the form at that stage.

Hope this make sense.

Nikki Ozeken

Customer Marketing and VAS Manager

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest

NSW 2153 Australia
Phone: +61 2 8858 1841
Mobile: +61 427 017 997
E-Mail: nikki.ozeken@sonova.com

Internet: http://www.phonak.com.au/
@glen can you please action the below changes. Cheers

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Thanks for this, please see some edits below:

Co-op support request form changes

Please make the business name, website address, email address and contact number as required fields.

Can we remove the 'Save and send' as we want to encourage clients to fill out the entire questionnaire.



On the list of campaign questions, please add the following questions as the first couple in the order below:

'What areas does your clinic specialise in? Pick tick the boxes that apply'

Rehabilitation

Medical

Tinnitus

Balance

Paediatric

Other - Please specify (add a free text box)

Replace this question and the answer options



to:

'What type of customers are you servicing? Pick tick the boxes that apply.'

Traditional (age related hearing, noise exposure)

Tech savvy (interested in the latest hearing aid features)

Modern customer (comfortable with technology and remote appointments)

'What sectors are you servicing? Pick tick the boxes that apply.'

Private customers

Government

Mix of both

Keep this line 'Please provide any additional information' and free text box.

Please remove the 'Save and send' link.



Co-op support request form changes

Please make the same fields required as the request form.

Pease remove 'save and send' link



Please remove 'save and send' link on second page.



Thanks Heath.

Nikki Ozeken

Customer Marketing and VAS Manager

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest

NSW 2153 Australia
Phone: +61 2 8858 1841
Mobile: +61 427 017 997
E-Mail: nikki.ozeken@sonova.com

Internet: http://www.phonak.com.au/

Hi Nikki, 

Thanks for your patience with these. 

Both forms have now been updated as requested. I have also shortened their URLs:

https://phonakmarketing.com.au/agreement-form/
https://phonakmarketing.com.au/co-op-support/

You will see a 'Save and send' link on each form. If you click this, a dynamic link will be created. You can copy this link and send it to the client to complete the rest of the information. 

Also, please let me know if you would like us to make any of the fields 'required'.

Hi Heath, Thanks for pulling this together so quickly. I checked my junk and can't see the submission form? Just a couple of queries. Agreement form
  • Please remove social media handles field
  • Please add a signature box for the Phonak representative to sign
  • Just checking that this form can be pre-filled by Phonak and a link can be sent to the client to sign?
  • Once signed, is it possible to download and save as a pdf?
Request form
  • I can't see the check boxes. I'm using Chrome.
Once completed if you could show me how to access the backend to download the data. Thanks. Nikki Ozeken Customer Marketing and Value Added Services Sonova Australia Pty Ltd 12 Inglewood Place, Norwest NSW 2153 Australia Phone: +61 2 8858 1841 Mobile: +61 427 017 997 E-Mail: nikki.ozeken@sonova.com Internet: http://www.phonak.com.au/

Hi Nikki, 

Confirming these forms are ready for you to review. 

We set them up to send you a copy of the submission - let me know if you receive these as I know your email filters there are quite strict.

https://phonakmarketing.com.au/phonak-marketing-support-agreement-form/
https://phonakmarketing.com.au/phonak-co-op-marketing-support-request-form/

We have removed some of the 'internal' fields on the marketing support form as they are not needed in this context I don't think. 

Additionally, the checkboxes on the co-op form all side by side (3 columns) was too tight, so we have stacked them. Where possible it's a good idea to avoid 'wide' forms from a UX perspective. 

Take them for a spin and let us know if you require any further tweaks? And have a great weekend

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Guys,

There are 2 forms in the attached word doc.

Can you please create two new pages on phonakmarketing.com.au for them?

Hi Heath,

Hope your day is going well.

For co-op marketing requests outside the Momentum program, we need to design an application form and an agreement form.

We’d like to house the forms in the Phonak digital marketing catalogue home page and were hoping to create them as dynamic forms so that once submitted, a copy of the form gets emailed to myself and the data can be stored and accessed from the site backend. Is this possible? Does it even make sense?

If this is not possible, we can just leave them as a blank form to download and we’ll add request for them to be emailed to myself on the forms.

Attached is the brief for both forms. Would you be able to create them with Phonak branding?

Call me to discuss if things are not clear.

Timelines: I know you guys are busy so this is not super urgent but if we can have it completed in the next two weeks, that would be great.

Thanks.

Nikki Ozeken
Customer Marketing and Value Added Services

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest
NSW 2153 Australia
Phone: +61 2 8858 1841
Mobile: +61 427 017 997
E-Mail: nikki.ozeken@sonova.com <mailto:nikki.ozeken@sonova.com>
Internet: www.phonak.com.au <http://www.phonak.com.au/>
